section.title: Overview
section.para: The module does a very basic handling for ua-profile. You can subscribe to ua-profile provisioning information if you add a provisioning document to presentity table.
Warning: When you add provisioning config to presentity table, then you must make sure that you set the presentity table expires field to a time value in long future

If your user agent is subscribing to AoR and if the subscription event is ua-profile, then it will receive provisioning data in the notification body. Read more about sip user agent configuration framework in RFC6080. http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6080

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
presence.

section.title: Exported Functions
section.para: None to be used in configuration file.
